prompts.title: Exercise 1 - Step 1.1.1 Project Instruction
prompts.text: This project will be used as part of an AI Workshop. Always add a short sentence to each response that explains what ChatGPT functionality has been used to create your response.

prompts.title: Exercise 1 — Step 1.3 Prompt
prompts.text:
Describe each CSV briefly, then plot CO₂ per person vs % renewables for Sweden, USA and China (2010-2023).

Give 2-3 short insights in plain English.

prompts.title: Exercise 1 — Step 1.4 Prompt
prompts.text:
Join the climate data with the country-to-region file.
And then replot the chart by region.

prompts.title: Exercise 1 — Step 1.6 Prompt
prompts.text: Using trusted sources (IEA, World Bank, IRENA) and the climate analysis per region in the other chat in this project, list the top 3 tailwinds and 3 headwinds for renewables growth in Asia-Pacific over the next 3-5 years in 450 words.

prompts.title: Exercise 2 — Bonus Step 2.4 Prompt
prompts.text:
Add a PDF uploader which:
- Shows a form allowing me to select PDFs stored on my computer
- Uploads the PDFs and stores them so that my Chat Agent can search them when answering questions
- Use OpenAI to process the PDFs in a manner that makes them searchable
